message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's worth more to you than that. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a great deal. I'm willing to come down a bit to $9,500. It's still a good price for you, considering the value you'll get from the product. Let's make this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,200. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
